title: Rust Variable Bindings and Type Inference
description: In this lab, we learn about variable bindings in Rust, where values can be assigned to variables using the let binding, and how type annotations can be used but are often inferred by the compiler.

meta.title: Rust Variable Bindings and Type Inference
meta.description: Learn about variable bindings and type inference in Rust programming language.
meta.keywords: type inference, rust playground, coding, rust online compiler, rust tutor, rust commands, variable bindings, rust online playground, rust practice, rust online
